TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division B Regional 3
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.243.cipherString: Many of life's failures are people who did not realise how close they were to success when they gave up.
CIPHER.243.question: A quote from Thomas Edison has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say? When you have solved it, raise your hand so that the time can be recorded and the solution checked.

CIPHER.250.cipherString: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
CIPHER.250.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Theodore Roosevelt using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.262.cipherString: A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.
CIPHER.262.question: A quote from Anthony Robbins has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher. What does it say?

CIPHER.257.cipherString: Prosperity makes some friends and many enemies.
CIPHER.257.question: A quote has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 6=●×, 5=×–, 3=●–, 4=––, 7=×●, 1=–×

CIPHER.248.cipherString: Eat alive frog first thing in teh mourning and nothing worst will happen to you teh wrest of teh day.
CIPHER.248.question: Your friend offered you some advice in the form of a Cryptogram, but they are a terrible speller.  You are told that it contains the word HAPPEN.

CIPHER.264.cipherString: The three great essentials of success are, first, try; second, try again; and third, keep trying.
CIPHER.264.question: Encode this quote by JOHN TASKINSOY using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.255.cipherString: The reward of a thing well done is having done it.
CIPHER.255.question: A quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3=–, 1=●, 6=×, 7=●, 9=×, 2=–

CIPHER.265.cipherString: Always do what you are afraid to do.
CIPHER.265.question: The following by Ralph Waldo Emerson quote needs to be encoded with the Affine Cipher using a=7 and b=9.

CIPHER.263.cipherString: Never let a problem to be solved, become more important than a person to be loved.
CIPHER.263.question: Solve this quote from Thomas S. Monson which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.259.question: After solving the cryptarithm COOK+MINCE=BAKING decode the phrase 17352 90638 64827.

CIPHER.260.cipherString: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
CIPHER.260.question: The following quote by Albert Einstein needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of CLOCK

CIPHER.254.cipherString: He who can have patience can have what he will.
CIPHER.254.question: A quote by Benjamin Franklin has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 8=–, 4=×, 2=–, 7=×, 1=●

CIPHER.252.cipherString: Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.
CIPHER.252.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by LeBron James using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with DONT

CIPHER.266.cipherString: To achieve great success, you first have to learn to admire great failure.
CIPHER.266.question: A quote by Abhishek Aditeya has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 2 and 4 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.258.cipherString: Search for the good ways. And walk in right path.
CIPHER.258.question: A quote by Lailah Gifty Akita has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with SEARCH.

CIPHER.246.cipherString: The state of that man's mind who feels too intense an interest as to future events, must be most deplorable.
CIPHER.246.question: Decode a quote by SENECA that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher with a K1 alphabet. You are told that it contains the word MOST.

CIPHER.247.cipherString: Success in life is a matter not so much of talent or opportunity as of concentration and perseverance.
CIPHER.247.question: Decode a quote by Chas. W. Wendte that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K2 alphabet. You are told that it contains the word TALENT.

CIPHER.245.cipherString: Great powers and natural gifts do not bring privileges to their possessor, so much as they bring duties.
CIPHER.245.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Henry Ward Beecher which has the word THEIR in it.

CIPHER.251.cipherString: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
CIPHER.251.question: The following symbols encode a phrase by Dr. Seuss using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.267.cipherString: The heart of a fool is in his mouth, but the mouth of a wise man is in his heart.
CIPHER.267.question: A quote by Benjamin Franklin has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.253.cipherString: Cuando te des cuenta de lo perfecto que es todo, inclinarás la cabeza hacía atrás y te reirás del cielo.
CIPHER.253.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Buddha into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  You are told that letters HDAE map to BEZA.
CIPHER.253.translation: When you realize how perfect everything is, you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.

CIPHER.261.cipherString: We don't have to be thankful for an adverse situation, but we can be thankful for all the good things that sustain us.
CIPHER.261.question: Solve this quote from Patricia King which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.256.cipherString: It's easy to forget things you don't need anymore.
CIPHER.256.question: A quote by Haruki Murakami has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 5=●–, 9=●×, 6=×–, 2=–●, 8=–×

CIPHER.249.cipherString: There are two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
CIPHER.249.question: A famous phrase from Einstein has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet. It starts with THERE. What did they say?

CIPHER.244.cipherString: My goal is simple. It is a complete understanding of the universe, why it is as it is and why it exists at all.
CIPHER.244.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Stephen Hawking which has the word EXISTS in it.
